reviews.comments: Alex's place was easy to find and convenient located at Wedding S-Bahn and U-bahn. The rooms were clean and cosy, we had a good night's rest. He was also nice enough to come by to open the gate, to allow us to drop out suitcases off in the hall earlier than the check-in time. The only downside was the toilet which was small but that wasn't much of a problem either. Overall a very wonderful stay at this uniquely decorated apartment!

The apartment was wonderful.  It was a bit quirky and looks exactly like the pictures.  My friend and I found a wonderful Korean restaurant a few blocks away and we also found a nice bar to grab some small bites and drinks at.  It is very close to the subway station and it was clean spacious and overall a perfect fit.  We never met Alex but he was very gracious and very quick to respond to messages!  I would stay here again if I were in Berlin!

Very cute place. Very near the train station and lots of cheap turkish food around. Near the grocery and pharmacy. Did'nt have hard time to contact, check out and check in went so smoothly. Quiet area also. Complete kitchen and very clean. Hot shower works very good.
Easy stay in an easy place. Perfectly located if you're a tango dancer and there's a festival in Tango Loft. :)

Our stay at alex place was really nice. The apartment was very clean and accurate to the photos. We didn't have the chance to meet alex but he was reachable by phone even when we wanted to know where was the best place to go out. I recommend this place ! Very spacious ! Thank you alex !
The flat was huge and great for a group of 5! Alex's friend Sam let us into the flat, explained everything and even gave us recommendations of places to go out!

We were 9 girls for the Bachelorette Party of my sister and we stayed in Berlin for one night. The maisonette was as described super nice and with good space. 

Alex was really responsive and the exchange of keys went well. 

Definitely would recommend it :-)

Alex was very helpful giving good directions and being accommodating and flexible when we had to arrange to check in a bit later than planned. The flat was gorgeous with comfy beds and very spacious. Alex's friend Sam came to let us in and show us around, and he gave us some great tips for what to do in this interesting Berlin area. A great experience all round!

The flat was very nice and well equipped. Close to public transportation, shops and city center.Never met Alex, but he was very polite. Me and my friends recommend this apt with two hands!
Thanks!

Very nice flat, it is comfortable, spacious and well equipped. It is also well located with public transportation and shops nearby. No problems with the host, he is very nice, polite and reactive. We recommend this place.

After a short berliner adventure our stay was great. The flat fits for a group like we were with a big table in the living room. Not far from the bahn. We really enjoyed our stay. Alex was helping when needed.

Very easy to find, spare keys helped hugely as our group had separate plans over the weekend.
Cheap, spacious, modern, practical .
I'd definitely use again - I will be coming back to paint with top artists later in the year.

Hey, 
everything was great. The whole apartment is an atmospheric labirinth. Get ready for the most surprising and cosy apartment. We really enjoyed our stay here. Highly recommended if you don't look for an average place to stay.
Best
Akos from Budapest

It was brilliant experience for us.
We stayed two days and everything was perfectly same as you can see the picture. The thing is only the distance from citycenter but berlin metro is super as you know.
So that was not really problem.
The house is huge and pretty.
Every facillity is well equipped.
To be honest, i didn't want to leave that house. I would really recommend this house.
The apartment was exactly where it is advetised, everything was perfect, keys were where agreed. I totally recommend it.

Alex' apartment is really pretty and spacious. A lot of room for just me and my boyfriend haha. The kitchen has everything you need, the shower is nice, the dining table is huge, the bed is comfortable and the music installation is really good, just everything you need.. and it's just so pretty! There's a supermarket and a big S-bahn station nearby and the neighborhood felt safe. We loved our stay.
Alex was reactive, nice and his place was enjoyable. We were looking for one night the very day and he saved us :)
Great host. Nice clean home and close to centre. Highly recommmend.

The place was very welcoming: decoration, bright on daytime,  space of the rooms, clean (towels and bed sheet) and tidy up. We were 5 persons. I could exchange and arrange easily the staying with our host. The flat is well located (Ubahn station nearby by walk), small locals shops and quiet. That was a great experience for my first coming in Berlin. I recommand this place :)

The House is very nice, friendly and situated in an excellent position. We were in 7 for a business trip and we very well distributed in the various rooms where the beds. The neighborhood is quiet, but very well connected thanks to the station very close. Recommended!

Me and my 4 friends we spent 4 night in Alex's place. It's was a good moment in berlin, the appartement was clean and enough big four 5. It's located near of a subway station so you can easely go in the centre of berlin.
The house was beyond any expectations. A little paradise in a central area!
The flat was really lovely, near the undwrground and fully equipped. THe pictures are true to life. We didn't meet Alex.
The apartment is located near the subway station, unusual design, apartment was  clean and comfortable. Will recommend for big companies.

Everything was as described. The apartment is very interesting, and slightly bizarre because of its unique structure, but we felt very at home there.
Alex was very responsive and helpful when we needed something.

Alex was great with communication and although we didn't meet him in person, he organised a friend to let us into the apartment. The apartment was clean and quite big. We had a car so we were able to drive to most places and street parking is available right outside the apartment. There are a few bars and places to eat close by too. Great value.
Alex's place is beautiful and spacious. Everything is fine. Higly recommanded

Alex answered all my questions very quickly. The description of the flat cprresponds with my experience. We were 5 and had enough space. The apt was clean and we enjoyed its design and funny and "mysterious" stairs to pieces...
We arrived late in berlin and got the key at a cafe, which is on the way from subway to the apartment. It was big enough for 2 persons. Very clean and quiet.

My friends and I enjoyed our stay in apartment. It was big enough for five people. The apartment was also clean and well equipped. I didn't meet Alex in person, but communication with him was very good. Flexible departure time and close location to the S-Bahn station were very useful for our onward journey.

Alex's Place was very clean, nice, and super spacious. I would stay here again. 

There is even a small convenience store next door and the place has has excellent connection to public transport via U Wedding.

We haven't met Alex, but he arranged everything perfectly. He communicates promptly, which is very good. The apartment is very unusual ground floor place, but it has all the comfort a treveller needs. It is clean and feels warm. Concerning the arrangement of the apartment - there are two double beds there, One of those in a bedroom at the backside parto of the flat, one in the living room - consider this if you are traveling and absolutely need some privacy. There are other 2 - 3 sigle beds that can be used in various places of the apartment. Although the place is a ground floor space and the largest part is facing the street, we found it very calm. The location is excellent, S-bahn station is just a few minutes walk away.

The apartment was as described and clean. We really like the design of the apartment. The location and connection is perfect. So everything was perfect. We could completely enjoy our stay. Thank you! :)

The apartment exceeded our expectations, it was quiet and spacious. The layout a bit quirky with the shower in the kitchen. Alex was easy to contact and arrived quicky to deliver the keys when we arrived. On departure we were able to leave our luggage at a nearby place until later that day.

The appartment was awesome, and actually cooler than the photos portray. Alex was also a great host. If we had the slightest issue, he was always there to fix it. The area around the flat is not too exiting, but it is very well connected transit wise, and perfect for a traveller who wants to get around Berlin, which is what you should do ;)

Die Wohnung von Alex war für unsere Zwecke absolut tauglich - wir haben alles vorgefunden was wir brauchten - Die Kommunikation mit Alex war hervorragend! Kostenfreies Parken ist auf der Strasse möglich und es gibt innerhalb von 300 m verschiedene Einkaufsmöglichkeiten die wir gut nutzen konnten. Wir würden wieder bei Alex übernachten!

Alex ist ein super Gastgeber, die Abholung des Schlüssels funktionierte reibungslos. Die Wohnung ist für 9 Personen mehr als ausreichend und für einen kürzeren Aufenthalt (bei uns ein Junggesellenabschied) absolut geeignet.
Die Wohnung verfügt über eine Küche und liegt im EG.

Nous étions en vacances chez Alex avec nos 3 enfants âgés de 2 à 8 ans. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Alex mais la communication avec lui a été parfaite. Une bouteille de vin de bienvenue nous attendait.
Les photos correspondent bien à l'appartement. Nous avons été surpris par la salle de bain qui est dans la cuisine mais cela ne nous a pas posé problème. L'appartement est bien équipé.
Le quartier est calme la nuit. Nous avons très bien dormi. L'appartement est idéalement situé pour découvrir la ville, 5 minutes à pied des stations U et S-bahn, arrêt de bus devant l'immeuble. Supermarché à 3 minutes à pied.
Alles hat super funktioniert, die Wohnung war sauber und genau wie in der Beschreibung angegeben. Ich komme gerne wieder!

Alex es un anfitrión estupendo. Fuimos un grupo de 7 amigos, cuando llegamos todo estaba muy limpio y con toallas para todo el mundo. Las cosas básicas para la casa las ofrece Alex (papel higiénico, secador, sal azúcar... Puede que sea de otros huéspedes, pero siempre se agradece)
Aunque la administración de la casa es un poco extraña, es muy acogedora; su ubicación es muy buena, hay un supermercado a 2 minutos de la casa y el metro está a 5min.
Nos advirtieron del ruido, ya que los vecinos pueden ser un poco susceptibles por la música, pero la verdad que nosotros no tuvimos ningún problema.

Una estancia muy buena!

Ich hatte mit Alex lediglich Telefonkontakt: Er war sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und alle Vereinbarungen wurden eingehalten.
Alles Top, ich kann es nur weiterempfehlen!
봥의 구죠가 생각보돠 되게 의상해요. 되게 눫긴한데 그래서그런지 마니 츄워요. 주봥이랑 샤워쉴은 반지하고 화좡실은 일쩜오층, 침쉴은 이충이예여.

Wir haben uns in Alex' Apartment außerordentlich wohl gefühlt. Die Beschreibung der Unterkunft entsprach genau dem, was wir dort vorfanden. Es war sogar noch schöner und kuscheliger. Es war sauber und sehr gemütlich und wir haben vorzüglich geschlafen. Das Bettzeug und die Handtücher lagen schon parat, und die Absprachen mit Alex funktionierten zuverlässig und einwandfrei.
Die Nachbarn waren so leise, dass wir sie kaum bemerkt haben.
Jederzeit würde ich wieder dieses Apartment von Alex buchen.

Tolle Wohnung, die einfach so schön "Berlin" ist! Wir waren mit unserer Familie zu Fünft, hatten alle genug Platz und haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Wohnung ist etwas Besonderes, sie ist relativ verwinkelt - so hatte jeder seine Ecke -, sie ist schön eingerichtet und sie ist, für jeden der Berlin ein bisschen kennt, so herrlich typisch Berlin (leider gibt es das ja immer weniger)! Also jeder der die Stadt nicht nur besichtigen, sondern auch - wenn auch nur für kurze Zeit - ein bisschen in ihr Leben möchte, für den ist diese Wohnung perfekt. Außerdem hat organisatorisch alles wunderbar funktioniert! Vielen Dank für die tolle Zeit!

Inviato da iPhone

(Inizio messaggio inoltrato)

Da: Lalla Ausiello 
Data: 8 gennaio (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) CET
A: (EMAIL HIDDEN)
Oggetto: Recensione Alex

My daughter with her 7 friends spent the holiday by Alex. They didn't meet him but they were checked in by a very kind friend of him that was also cleaning the apartment  when they arrived. Therefore they had to come back later since the apartment needed a very accurate cleaning. 
The apartment is an unconventional place : not a large house, on three levels, with many beds and couches spread all over the house (also a shower in the kitchen

Cuando llegamos, ya tarde en la noche, las camas estaban hechas y la casa muy calentita. El barrio nos gustó mucho por su cercanía al centro y la casa es muy cómoda. Si vas con toda la familia cada quien puede tener su espacio. Muy recomendable.

Mein Gastgeber Alex war sehr freundlich und alle Vereinbarungen wurden eingehalten. 
Die Wohnung hätte ein wenig sauberer sein können (Staub, Bettwäsche par kleine Flecken, muffiger Geruch), aber eine Wohnung, in der bis zu 7 Personen schlafen können und sich zudem in Wedding befindet, sollte man auch nicht mehr erwarten. Die Wohnung ist eine Erdgeschosswohnung, die früher mal eine BAr oder ein Kiosk war. Vor diesem Hintergrund sind die Türen und Fenster direkt am Bürgersteig, so dass von aussen direkt ins Wohnzimmer geschaut werden kann. Allerdings gibt es Rollos und durchsichtige Folie. Angenehm ist dies aber nicht. 
Anonsten alles TOP
Hat alles prima geklappt. Danke!

Unser Aufenthalt war super. Eine nicht ganz alltägliche Wohnung, genau richtig, für einen Berlin-Besuch. Wir waren zu viert und hatten reichlich Platz. Die Wohnung war gut geheizt, auffallend sauber und es war alles vorhanden.

Alex war extrem hilfsbereit. Da der Internet Anbieter irgendwie Probleme hatte und somit das WLAN nicht funktionierte, hat uns Alex innert kurzer Zeit mobile Datenrouter installiert. Sehr zuvorkommend! 

Wir haben früher selber in Berlin gewohnt, aber Wedding kannten wir nicht so gut. Insofern war es äusserst spannend mal diese Ecke zu entdecken. Es gibt viele Grünflächen in der Nähe und einen Spaziergang an der Panke gleich nebenan lohnt sich auch sehr. 

Wir kommen gerne wieder!

Wir haben uns sofort wohlgefühlt, weil der Empfang und die Schlüsselübergabe reibungslos abliefen. Ausserdem war alles super aufgeräumt. Toll war auch, dass überall Handtücher waren :) 
Man ist schnell bei der Bahn und fährt auch nicht sonderlich lange ins Zentrum. Auch alle Nachbarn waren sehr nett. Auf jeden Fall eine Top-Adresse wenn man zu zweit reist!
